comments: Very fun and interesting guy. Likes to talk a lot, but keeps it entertaining. Ten take home key-term quizzes, ten terms each. No tests. Five, 2-page reading response papers and 1 final paper. Really easy to get good grades on them. And if you\'re offended by foul language, he\'s not the teacher for you. Overall, fun, interesting, easy class. =]

I had him for World Religions, the class was fun, he kept it interesting, and he was a very fun teacher. I loved the material that we learned and I felt that I took alot away from the class when it was over. I would gladly take another class taught by Santos Roman.
Good teacher, very funny and will keep you interested. Has alot of stories about his life experiences. cares about students.
